oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Bragg : senior photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait photograph of John Bragg from the Midlander yearbook of 1940. His listed activities include: "Social Science; English; Education; President A.S.B., '40; Editor Sidelines, '39, '40; Advertising Manager Midlander, '37, '38; President, Freshman Class; Basketball, '37, '38, '39, '40; Baseball, '38, '39, '40; Golf, '40; Congressman, '40; and Alternate Captain, Basketball, '39.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Male college students; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College
